data.text: @Reuters Yes. This is the best time to correct the mistakes of the past and bring home the jobs and the goods. Just shipping them now cannot be cost efficient.  China has declared that they are friendlier than ever with Russia. Neither will ever leave there murderous pasts behind.

@Opinion_Skinny @kabzibit @Reuters You see, that's why we have black Lives Matter here. Seeing other countries develop, we should study and learn from them. It is right for a country to make its citizens richer. Isn't it tragic that everyone from the president on down is working for Wall Street and the arms dealer
@martwoo82 @Reuters Just the usual mandatory doom & gloom of our Reuters propagandist hacks.

@Opinion_Skinny @Reuters Another one who fails to understand how the international companies work, oblivious to the fact that China is the biggest car market in the world... Nobody with common sense will 'come home' to supply from there a distant car market, it would be far more costly & involve tarrifs.

@Reuters 'But what weâ€™ve seen in the course of last year is that there is a new reality that has set in, where the policies and sentiment of the Trump administration remain in place with the Biden administration'

i.e. a bipartisan malevolent US foreign policy trying to rise tensions: QED
@ChiefEngineerFY @kabzibit @Reuters I don't fund communist countries. So no thanks.

@NicholasHuff83 @Reuters Another indoctrinated tool: IRL  China has consistently supported Ukraine's sovereignty & territorial integrity, is actually the first trade partner of Ukraine, etc, but you seem to believe the factless US geopoliticized propaganda pushed down your willingly ignorant throat, ofc.

@Opinion_Skinny @kabzibit @Reuters We are both civilians. I don't trust the media or politicians. I trust my own feelings about life. I don't know about Russia. I have been to China and it is safe and comfortable. When the epidemic is over, go to China and see what the country Wall Street labeled evil looks like.

@kabzibit @ChiefEngineerFY @Reuters Values? Seriously? 
Oh you mean "Christian values". Because "I don't believe you should be LGBTQI" values.
Stop trying to rule people's lives. Jesus!
Russia and China are communist countries, but whatever. Decline......Laughable.

@Opinion_Skinny @ChiefEngineerFY @Reuters It's leading to the decline of the great US. ALL the values your founding fathers espoused to make America great have been eroded. China will emerge as the new world power. Alongside Russia
